bibl.title: Letter from John S. Fulton to Howard A. Kelly, February 25, 1907

div1.p: Fulton encloses an editorial proof from the Maryland Medical Journal in support of the Carroll pension bill.

div1.head: Letter from John S. Fulton to Howard A. Kelly, February 25, 1907
div1.opener:
L
State Board of Health
OF MARYLAND
8 AND 10 SOUTH STREET
BALTIMORE Feb. 25, 1907
WM. H. WELON, M. D., PRESIDENT
DR. EUGENE JONES
DR. E. J. DIMICKSON
DR. JAMES ROSLEY
MR. DOUGLAS M. THOMAS, JR.
HON. WM. S. BRYAN, JR.
JOHN N. FULTON, M. D., SECRETARY.
Dr. Howard A. Kelly,
1418 Eutaw Place,
City.
Dear Dr. Kelly:-
div1.p:
I am sending you proof of an editorial that I
thought would interest you, which will be out in the Maryland Medical
Journal at the end of the week. I have tried to do what I could to
help Carroll along, but so far as I remember I have not printed
anything about him before. I know him very well. I have talked
to Congressmen about him, and talked to medical men in various parts
of the country about him.
